brand.name: Harbor Bistro
brand.tagline: Family-Friendly Dining ‚Ä¢ Comfort Food Done Right

hero.title: Great Food, Great Friends, Great Times
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Harbor Bistro, where delicious comfort food meets warm hospitality. Perfect for family dinners, date nights, and everything in between. We're your home away from home.
hero.imageAlt: Cozy restaurant interior with families dining

about.title: Welcome to Our Family
about.body: Founded in 2010 by the Martinez family, Harbor Bistro has become a beloved neighborhood gathering spot. We believe great food brings people together. Our menu features classic American favorites made from scratch with quality ingredients. Whether you're celebrating a birthday or just grabbing dinner on a Tuesday, we treat every guest like family.
about.subtitle: Why neighbors love us

chef.name: Maria Martinez
chef.title: Owner & Head Chef
chef.bio: Maria grew up in her grandmother's kitchen, learning the art of comfort food. After culinary school, she returned home to open Harbor Bistro with her family. Her goal: serve food that makes people smile.

products.name: Classic Burger & Fries
products.description: Half-pound Angus beef, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles on a brioche bun with crispy fries

products.name: Kids' Chicken Tenders

products.name: Chocolate Lava Cake

items.title: üåÆ Taco Tuesday
items.description: $2 tacos all day - beef, chicken, or fish

items.text: Our go-to spot for family dinners! The staff knows us by name and the kids menu is actually good. The burger is incredible too.
items.author: Tom & Sarah Johnson

items.text: Best comfort food in town. The meatloaf reminds me of my grandmother's recipe. Portions are generous and prices are fair.
items.author: Linda Martinez

items.text: Friday night live music is a tradition for us. Great atmosphere, fantastic service, and the ribs are fall-off-the-bone perfect!
items.author: Mike Stevens

items.text: Had my daughter's 10th birthday party here. The staff made it so special! Great food, reasonable prices, and they really care.
items.author: Jennifer Park

steps.title: Call or Order Online

steps.title: We Prep Your Food
steps.description: Everything is made fresh to order

steps.title: Enjoy at Home
steps.description: Our food travels well - still delicious at home!

items.question: Do you take reservations?
items.answer: Walk-ins are always welcome! We recommend calling ahead for parties of 6+ or Friday/Saturday evenings.

items.question: Do you have a kids menu?
items.answer: Yes! We have a full kids menu with favorites like chicken tenders, mac & cheese, and mini burgers. All kids meals include a drink.

items.question: Can I order takeout?
items.answer: Absolutely! Call us at (555) 234-5678 or order through our website. Most orders are ready in 20-30 minutes.

items.question: Do you deliver?
items.answer: Yes! We deliver through DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Grubhub. Or call us directly for delivery within 3 miles.

items.question: What are your daily specials?
items.answer: Taco Tuesday ($2 tacos), Pasta Wednesday (20% off), Friday Live Music, and Sunday Brunch. Plus Kids Eat Free Mondays!

items.question: Can you accommodate dietary restrictions?
items.answer: Yes! We can modify most dishes for vegetarian, gluten-free, and allergy needs. Just let your server know.

items.question: Do you have a private room?
items.answer: Yes! Our back room fits up to 30 people. Perfect for birthdays, showers, and celebrations. No room fee - just a food minimum.

items.question: Is there parking?
items.answer: Yes! We have a free parking lot behind the restaurant. Street parking is also available.
